{"uuid":"627b7409dd42d9c3e3ef9fa4a2cd846ee7511693","bioAsHtml":"

Andrey Falko was a Principal Software Engineer at Salesforce for 9 years, where he built and scaled CI systems for three different groups. Use cases have been large systems such as Salesforce's flagship CRM product, a virtual machine and container management system, and more recently, SOA components across Salesforce Technology and Products. Andrey started at Lyft in August, where he's a software engineer on Data Platforms, starting out with the Streaming team and focused on reliability and scale.
